work.title: KarmaCheck
points: Debugged and fixed bugs inside a Vue 3 application
Collaborated with other developers on a rebranding project within a NuxtJS/Vue 3 monorepo
Laid off after a month as part of a 20% workforce reduction

work.title: Curate
points: Designed the Front-End architecture for a rebuild of the Curate app using VueJS, Vite, and Vuetify
Worked within a serverless backend framework using AWS AppSync and GraphQL
Managed microservices using AWS technologies including DynamoDB, Lambda, and RDS
Led a team of 7 developers in both Agile and Kanban workflows
Led code deployments to both staging and production environments
Wrote documentation for systems and processes to help onboard new developers and simplify future development
Reviewed pull requests from other developers to ensure the code stayed clean and concise

work.title: Bizlibrary
points: Led the development of a site refresh using VueJS and Fomantic-UI
Made architecture decisions and set coding standards for VueJS applications
Worked with a team to build a serverless backend using Amazon Web Services
Worked with a UI designer and the Product team to theme Fomantic-UI for our needs
Made occasional changes to C# Controllers and Repositories as well as MySQL scripts

work.title: Bullhorn Inc.
points: Worked with other developers to transition a Back Office application from Flash to Angular2
Wrote unit tests in both PHP and JavaScript
Worked with Selenium automation written in Java to triage possible bugs

work.title: Westminster College IT Department
points: Worked with a team to keep the campus technology in working order
Responded to technology service requests in a timely manner
Answered Help Desk telephone and respond to service requests
Worked with campus coordinators to set up audio and visual equipment for major events on campus
Assisted with the upkeep of wireless network access points on campus
Diagnosed hardware and software issues on computers and other devices
Replaced and installed necessary hardware on computers

portfolio.title: Brendan Rates Movies
portfolio.description: Built a full-stack web app to rate and visualize movie data using a NuxtJS and Vue 3 frontend and an AWS backend.

points.description: Fall 2012, Spring 2013, Fall 2013, Spring 2014, Fall 2014, Spring 2015, Fall 2015
